config.startCommand: rm -rf public/storage && php artisan storage:link && chmod -R 775 storage/app/public public/storage && php artisan optimize:clear && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=${PORT}

deploy.startCommand: bash -c 'php artisan migrate --force && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=${PORT}'
